mapper.insert: insert into member(MB_num, MB_id, MB_pw, MB_name, MB_regNum, MB_gender, MB_nickName, MB_tel, MB_regDate) values((select nvl(max(MB_num), 0)+1 from member), #{MB_id}, #{MB_pw}, #{MB_name}, #{MB_regNum}, #{MB_gender}, #{MB_nickName}, #{MB_tel}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from member where MB_name=#{MB_name} and MB_tel=#{MB_tel}
select * from member where MB_name=#{MB_name} and MB_id=#{MB_id}
mapper.update: update member set MB_name=#{MB_name}, MB_nickName=#{MB_nickName}, MB_tel=#{MB_tel} where MB_id=#{MB_id}
update member set MB_del='Y' where MB_id=#{MB_id}
update member set MB_del='N' where MB_id=#{MB_id}
